title: Silvar Dollar Assignment
info: For this assignment please grade the following criteria manually.

tests.name: Game starts with random coin positions
tests.decr: Game has been restarted multiple times and coins are randomly allocated every single time.

tests.name: Coins can be dragged
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged (not testing if can be dropped) left for one square.

tests.name: Coins can be dragged
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged (not testing if can be dropped) right for one square.

tests.name: Coins can be dragged multiple squares
tests.descr: Coins can be dragged (not testing if can be dropped) left or right for multiple squares.

tests.name: Dropped coins end up centered in correct location
tests.descr: Legal moves end up with coins dropped in the center of final square.

tests.name: Illegal moves are not allowed
tests.descr: Cannot move a left coin one/multiple square(s) to the right in an empty square.

tests.name: Illegal moves are not allowed
tests.descr: Cannot move a left coin on top of a right coin.

tests.name: Illegal moves are not allowed
tests.descr: Cannot move a left coin past a right coin.

tests.name: Illegal moves are not allowed
tests.descr: Cannot move a right coin on top of a left coin.

tests.name: Illegal moves are not allowed
tests.descr: Cannot move a right coin past a left coin
